name: NSStackView.VisibilityPriority
desc: The various Auto Layout priorities for a view in the stack view to remain attached.

items.name: static let detachOnlyIfNecessary: NSStackView.VisibilityPriority
items.desc: The Auto Layout priority that results in detachment of a view when there is insufficient space in the stack view to display it fully.

items.name: static let mustHold: NSStackView.VisibilityPriority
items.desc: The default value, and maximum Auto Layout priority, that results in a view never detaching from the stack view.

items.name: static let notVisible: NSStackView.VisibilityPriority
items.desc: The minimum Auto Layout priority that forces a view to detach from the stack view.
